document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Crommor Villa (labeled N6) on the corner of the High Road and Immar Street.
document_data.name: Crommor Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Crommor Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Crommor]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located in the northwest section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] at the corner of the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]] and [[Immar Street]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: All three buildings that composed the villa compound were two stories tall.
